title: Jerry Jones has choices, Julio Jones to Bucs, Aaron Rodgers epic debut, Jalen Hurts and Trey Lance expectations
itunes:title: Jerry Jones has choices, Julio Jones to Bucs, Aaron Rodgers epic debut, Jalen Hurts and Trey Lance expectations
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Jerry Jones remarks as the Cowboys open training camp.  Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty explain the pressure and expectations that Mike McCarthy faces as the head coach in Dallas. Sara Walsh gives us the latest on Julio Jones joining Tom Brady and the Buccaneers.  Aaron Rodgers had an epic camp debut but how will the Packers offense fare this season?  Ian Rapoport and Mike Garofolo report from Eagles camp with expectations starting to pile onto Jalen Hurts.  Plus, the table debates how Trey Lance will lead the 49ers.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
